name: editor - css code example
description:
just in case you want to style the editor yourself. install the style and mess up your self.
if you want to use this like in the screenshot you have to do small updates in the code. I have to implement them to avoid failure messages within the userstyles.org code checker. remove all lines where you find "REMOVE THIS LINE" in the code.
to avoid a global style definition the code is active for the domain "css-code-example-for-any-browser.com"
